Table of Contents

Namespace MdFilesMerger.App.Abstract

Interfaces

ICRUDService<T>

Interface with base CRUD functionalities to serve stored private collection of IItem objects.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T>
Implementations: BaseDirectoryService<T>, BaseService<T>, RelativeFileService<T>, IgnoredFileService, MainDirectoryService, MergedFileService, SelectedFileService, UserService

IDirectoryService<T>

Base interface to service collection of entities implementing IDirectory interface.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T>
Implementations: BaseDirectoryService<T>, RelativeFileService<T>, IgnoredFileService, MainDirectoryService, MergedFileService, SelectedFileService

IEditFileService<T>

Interface with additional methods for handling collection of entities implementing IEditFile interface.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IEditFileService<T>
Implementations: MergedFileService, SelectedFileService

IIgnoredFileService

Interface for handling collection of ignored files objects.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IRelativeFileService<T> -> IIgnoredFileService
Implementations: IgnoredFileService

IMainDirectoryService

Interface to service collection of IMainDirectory objects.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IMainDirectoryService
Implementations: MainDirectoryService

IMenuActionService

Interface with functionalities to get menu actions.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> IMenuActionService
Implementation: MenuActionService

IMergedFileService

Interface with methods for handling collection of IMergedFile objects.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IEditFileService<T> -> IMergedFileService
Implementations: MergedFileService

IRelativeFileService<T>

Interface with additional methods for handling collection of objects associated with .md files, whose paths are stored as relative to connected main directory path.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IRelativeFileService<T>
Implementations: RelativeFileService<T>, IgnoredFileService, SelectedFileService

ISelectedFileService

Interface with methods for handling collection of selected file objects.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IRelativeFileService<T> -> ISelectedFileService
IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IDirectoryService<T> -> IEditFileService<T> -> ISelectedFileService
Implementations: SelectedFileService

IService<T>

Base interface for all services in MdFilesMerger.App project.

Inheritance: IService<T>
Implementations: BaseDirectoryService<T>, BaseService<T>, RelativeFileService<T>, IgnoredFileService, MainDirectoryService, MenuActionService, MergedFileService, SelectedFileService, UserService

IUserService

Defines methods to service IUser objects collection.

Inheritance: IService<T> -> ICRUDService<T> -> IUserService
Implementations: UserService
